original_text: And at once his fame spread everywhere throughout all the surrounding region of Galilee.
korean_text: 예수의 소문이 곧 온 갈릴리 사방에 퍼지더라

sentences.original_text: And at once his fame spread everywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 즉시 그의 소문이 사방으로 퍼져 나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: throughout all the surrounding region of Galilee.
